multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is a key difference between standard recurrent neural networks and neural ordinary differential equations (neural ODEs)?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: Standard recurrent neural networks update the Hidden State in discrete steps, while Neural ODEs update it continuously.
Neural ODEs are more stable than standard recurrent neural networks.
Neural ODEs use a damping factor to control the dynamics of the Hidden State.
